alert.note: Alert for Greene (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 09 at 2:19PM CST until January 09 at 3:00PM CST by NWS Mobile
info.description: The National Weather Service in Mobile has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... West central Washington County in southwestern Alabama... Northeastern Greene County in southeastern Mississippi... * Until 300 PM CST. * At 219 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located 11 miles southwest of State Line, or 14 miles north of Leakesville, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... State Line and Fruitdale. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 600 PM CST for southwestern Alabama...and southeastern Mississippi. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 600 PM CST for southwestern Alabama...and southeastern Mississippi.
